title: Kaiser close to 0 dmg with Hydra each round
body:
Kai'sa does only 20-30 dmg per attack (3% hydra)
It seems that she makes only hydra damage and nothing else anymore, but hydra should be added damage not replace her normal attackdmg ?

Itmes: Hydra, Cursed Blade, Trap Claw
Buffs: Nobles , Ranger
